Name: Helping_Children
Description: Help the children collect their items

Dialog.Sofia: Excuse me, I need your help with something.
Our kingdom is very low on supplies to train new troops. Could you please bring me &664 Rotten Flesh&f?
You dont have enough &6Rotten Flesh&f come back when you have enough.
Could you also get me &664 Bones&f?
You dont have enough &6Bones &fcome back when you have enough.
I will tell my Mom and Dad about you, they are always looking for people to help out!
